crochet terminology **description** the bavarian stitch uses a combination of basic crochet stitches to create an outstanding effect similar to mosaic tiles this pattern might look complicated at first but after you complete rounds 1-4 you ll understand how it works the pattern includes step-by-step pictures for each round to help you better visualize the stitches **finished measurements** trivet approx 12 by 12 inches 30 by 30 cm coaster approx 6 by 6 inches 15 by 15 cm **difficulty** beginner **materials** yarn 350 yds or 320 m of any dk weight yarn hook 3 mm notions scissors darning needle stitch marker **how do i download my pattern ** after completing the payment check your inbox for an email containing a download link button for the pdf pattern you will need a pdf reader installed to open the pattern **socials** instagram @crochethighway facebook crochethighway ravelry crochet highway designs **pattern support** if you have any questions or concerns please feel free
